long_description: Ride it, fold it and stash it in the closet. The 8-speed Tern Link D8 Folding Bike is ready for urban trips and errands with fenders for rainy day protection and a rear rack for hauling. Capable of folding in under 10 seconds, the Link D8 is a study in simplicity and ease; folded dimensions are 31.1 x 28.3 x 14.1 in. Strong 6061 aluminum frame is designed to minimize flex and deliver a stiff, responsive platform for efficient transfer of your pedaling energy. Strong, stiff OCL Joint frame hinge offers smooth, easy operation; large, smooth lever automatically locks into place. When frame is folded in half, the frame hinge surfaces lock together for a secure fit; lever folds flat and braces against joint for protection in transit. The precision-machined Physis folding handlepost features an oversized hinge and a secure lock to minimize flex. Handlepost hinge lever automatically locks in place and is easy to use; if hinge is accidentally left unlocked, the hinge won't open when handlebar is pushed forward. Handlepost hinge features 3 rubber seals to keep weather out and protect the headset; redundant double bolts clamp handlepost to steerer. Schwalbe Citizen tires feature double-layer puncture protection to deter flats. Accommodates riders up to 6 ft. 2 in. tall; recommended maximum weight of rider with gear is 242 lbs. Specs on the Tern Link D8 folding bike are subject to change.
